column4: quick question, will 32bit version of ubuntu work with 8 gigs of ram?  and will it be able to address all 8gigs?
the pae-version can adress 4gb and more
so 8 gig will be no issue?  where can i read about it, and how is it implemented?
pae can handle 8gb but pae is bad, so use amd64
another quick quetsion  X3460 intel, is it still amd64?
if there is "lm" then it is 64bit
no, i know it's a x64, but i'm no longer familiar with modern architectures.   amd is the same as intel ?
i guess amd is just throwing me off  :)
amd64 is for 64bit cous from amd and intel
